description: Mo626 Digital+ is National Bank of Malawi plc's Mobile Banking application that enables its customers access their accounts and perform transations from anywhere in the world, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Some of the functionalities available are: Account Balances, Statements, Funds Transfers  to accounts both within NBM as well as to other banks, Funds transfers to Mobile Wallets, International Remitances, Airtime purchases, Utility Bil payments and much more.

The First Capital Bank App makes your banking experience less of a hassle and more of an enjoyable experience.
 
Our app lets you:
 
1. Check your account balance
2. View a mini account statement
3. Enjoy peace of mind through fully encrypted end to end communication which makes the app one of the most secure banking apps on the market
4. Pay your utlility bills, buy airtime
5. Trasnfer funds to various banks
6. Real time opening and closure of Fixed Deposit Accounts
7. Make cardless ATM withdrawals
8. Complete card management which includes changing your ATM card pin, temporarily blocking and reactivating the card and  adjusting your withdrawl limits
9. Send bank statements to your mail id
10. Instant transfer functionality for Zimbabwe Customers using Zipit Smart

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

With FDH mobile banking, you can perform all your banking services which include transfers to other accounts, purchase airtime, purchase prepaid electricity, Pay your bills, initiate cardless withdrawal, access your FDH wallet and many many functions

developer: The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited
description:
Your money, your way

Easily track your finances, discover tools and features to help you manage your money, and explore personalised offers – all at your fingertips.

Effortless day-to-day banking

• Quick payments and transfers: Send money with ease
• Top up instantly: Buy airtime, data, SMS bundles, and electricity
• Send money vouchers: Share cash vouchers to anyone with a cellphone
• Hassle-free international payments: Make global transactions in just a few taps
• Play Lotto: Try your luck directly from the app

Take control of your money

• Open a savings account online: Start saving in minutes
• Manage your cards: Set payment limits, stop or replace cards quickly
• Access documents on-demand: Get stamped statements, bank letters and tax certificates
• Quick balance checks: View your balances without signing in
• Track insurance claims: Submit and monitor your building insurance claims easily

Everything you need, all in one place

• One view of all your accounts: See all your Standard Bank accounts in one convenient place
• Manage your loans: Handle your personal, vehicle and home loans with ease
• Get vehicle loan pre-approval: Apply for pre-approval in just a few taps
• Link your accounts to trading: Manage your share trading profile directly from the app
• Monitor your investments: View your Stanlib investments anytime, anywhere

Note: Availability of some features may vary depending on your region.

Your app will automatically update to ensure you always have the latest features and security upgrades.

Getting started

Simply download the app using data (charges apply for the initial download), but once you’re set-up, there are no data charges when using the app. As long as you have a connection, your banking is ready to go!

Transactional features are available to Standard Bank accounts held in South Africa, Ghana, Uganda, Botswana, Zimbabwe, Zambia, Tanzania, Lesotho, Malawi, eSwatini and Namibia. Keep in mind that some types of payments include transaction fees.  

Legal info  

The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited is a licensed financial services provider in terms of the Financial Advisory and Intermediary Services Act; and is a registered credit provider in terms of the National Credit Act, registration number NCRCP15.  

Stanbic Bank Botswana Limited is a Company (registration number: 1991/1343) incorporated in the Republic of Botswana and a registered commercial bank. Namibia: Standard Bank is a licensed banking institution in terms of the Banking Institutions Act, registration number 78/01799. Stanbic Bank Uganda Limited is regulated by the Bank of Uganda.

VISA COMMERCIAL PAY
Visa Commercial Pay brings secure, virtual payment cards to your mobile device for business purchases. 
Create or request virtual cards that can be used for online, in-app, or contactless payments via Apple Pay.
Manage business expenses efficiently, including travel bookings, and capture receipts on-the-go… all within one app.

WHO IS VISA COMMERCIAL PAY FOR?
Ideal for businesses of all sizes, Visa Commercial Pay lets colleagues, contractors or anyone in the business use virtual payment cards for any approved business expense.

CREATE OR REQUEST VIRTUAL CARDS
With Visa Commercial Pay, virtual cards can be securely created or requested in accordance with your company’s pre-defined policies. Push notifications immediately notify finance managers or approvers of new virtual card requests. Once approved, virtual cards are sent directly to your mobile device.
Alternatively, finance managers or approvers can create and send pre-defined cards directly to team members, without the need for individual requests. 

REVIEW SPENDING
Snap and upload pictures of receipts, and review transactions which are color-coded by type.

Notifications remind you to upload your receipts, which are then matched and attached to your transactions. No more paper. 

VISIBILITY OF CORPORATE SPEND
With Visa Commercial Pay all spend data securely flows back to a single centralized account, enabling complete visibility of virtual card creation and usage. With support for custom data fields such as employee, department or project references, finance managers can efficiently track, review and report on company spend.

The First Capital Bank corporate app (FCB Business) revolutionizes the way businesses manage their finances with its comprehensive internet banking capabilities. Crafted meticulously to cater to the intricate needs of corporate clients, this app seamlessly integrates key banking transactions into one user-friendly platform.

What sets this app apart is its robust security features, ensuring that corporate finances remain safeguarded at all times. With built-in encryption and advanced security protocols, users can conduct transactions with peace of mind, knowing that their sensitive financial data is protected from unauthorized access and cyber threats.

Convenience is paramount, and this app delivers on that front with its intuitive interface and mobile accessibility. Whether in the office or on the go, users can initiate, approve, or reject transactions with just a few taps, streamlining the banking process and saving valuable time.

Moreover, the app offers a wide range of functionalities beyond basic transactions. Users can seamlessly transfer funds to various banks, manage multiple accounts, view transaction histories, and much more, all within the same platform.

For businesses seeking a holistic banking solution that prioritizes security, efficiency, and convenience, the First Capital Bank corporate app (FCB Business) is the ultimate choice. Download the app today to experience the unparalleled benefits of a fully encrypted end-to-end corporate banking transactional solution. Trust in First Capital Bank, where belief comes first.

An app designed for administering pension plans at Nico Technologies Limited
It offers the following services to its users:-
- Shows benefit projections
- Show exit claims
- List contributions as well as interests and balances for each member from their pension schemes.

developer: The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited
description:
The Business Online App is the perfect companion to our online banking platform Business Online.

With the Business Online App, you can get instant access to your account balances, approve, authorise and audit payments on the go.

Use the Business Online mobile app to easily
> Audit and Authorise beneficiaries
> Access your account balances and statements
> Reset your password
> View and action payment, collection and transfer batches
> View audit logs

Getting started
Download and Install the Business Online mobile app and sign in with your Business Online credentials and token. You will have the same Access Rights and Permissions on this app that you have on Business Online. There are no data charges to use it. 

WHAT'S NEW 
We have heard the feedback from our customers and have taken the steps to introduce a digital sign-in solution, using Strong Authentication, that digitally confirms your identity when you transact with us on your smartphone or on the web. You will be able to access the available Business Online channels by signing in using the following:
•	Face ID
•	Finger Print
•	User selected app code

Should you have any further questions about Strong Authentication or require any assistance setting up the app, contact your Standard Bank representative or visit the Business Online website.

Found a bug? Have an idea? As always, thank you for your continued support. Please keep sending us your feedback and suggestions. We really appreciate it, and it really helps make our service and app better!

Legal info
The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited is a licensed financial services provider in terms of the Financial Advisory and Intermediary Services Act; and is a registered credit provider in terms of the National Credit Act, registration number NCRCP15.
Stanbic Bank Botswana Limited is a Company (registration number: 1991/1343) incorporated in the Republic of Botswana and a registered commercial bank. Namibia: Standard Bank is a licensed banking institution in terms of the Banking Institutions Act, registration number 78/01799. Stanbic Bank Uganda Limited is regulated by the Bank of Uganda.

Hello Paisa – International Money Transfers and Digital Banking
 
We are secure, fast, convenient and the best part is we come to you;
 
•	Settle remittances instantly from your account
•	Keep your money safe and secure with us
•	Free Person to Person Transfers
•	Access your money anywhere, anytime
•	We come to you
•	Visa Debit card to Swipe anywhere

Eversend is your go to app, offering you a full range of financial services, straight from your mobile phone. Unlike banks, we don’t have hidden fees, inconvenient operating hours and inflexible support. Instead, we offer instant money transfers to mobile money & free transfers to Eversend accounts; anytime, from anywhere in the world, with 24/7 support.

Open an account for free in under 5 minutes and enjoy full financial freedom!

Banks secretly overcharge you in foreign exchange fees when you use your local currency card to make payments online. Create an Eversend virtual dollar Visa card and save up to 13% in fees. 

Money Transfer
Send money to mobile money or Eversend accounts in Kenya, Rwanda & Uganda
Send money to bank accounts in Nigeria instantly 
Sending to Eversend accounts is completely free
Money transfers are instant

Multi currency Accounts and Currency Exchange
Hold and exchange six different currencies: GHC, KES, NGN, RWF, UGX & USD
Clearly displayed & affordable exchange rates, up to 70% cheaper than your bank

Adding Money to your Eversend Account
You can use mobile money in Ghana, Kenya, Rwanda or Uganda to add money OR;
Use a credit/debit card (VISA/Mastercard) in all supported countries and add money in USD (or NGN in Nigeria, UGX in Uganda, KES in Kenya, and TZS in Tanzania)

Additional Features
Electricity Payments in Uganda, never think twice about your bills again by conveniently setting up recurring payments 
Airtime available for purchase for Ghana, Kenya, Tanzania & Uganda
Eversend.me links that allow you to be paid instantly from anyone, even if they do not have an Eversend account. Go to MORE - Profile - Tag to set up your Eversend.me link
Purchase annual car insurance in Uganda, no extra fees! Eversend will keep track of when you need to renew your insurance and send you a timely notification

Earn Money with Eversend
We offer a referral bonus when your invitee installs, verifies and adds money to their account
Clearly displayed on the ‘Earn’ tab in the app

Coming soon
Bill payments in additional countries
Personal and group savings accounts
Personal loans
Investments - stock trading 

Testimonials


"I will one day write an essay about all the times @eversendapp saved my ***" - Viola N

"So I tried out @eversendapp today. It’s really a dope experience" - Lorna M

"Been messing around with @eversendapp for the last couple of minutes and I'm impressed. Onboarding was fast and the user experience is seamless” - Rukundo

"I would like to endorse Eversend. Very terrific customer care and reliable. I am already looking forward to the IPO" - Joseph O

We are grateful to be backed by partners such as Google Launchpad, Facebook Start, Techstars, Fast Track Malmö, Station F, BPIfrance, Ecobank, fsdafrica and The London School of Economics.

--

We hope to see you Eversending with us soon.

For more information, please visit our website: https://eversend.co 
Or check us out on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/eversendapp/ and Twitter: https://twitter.com/eversendapp

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.  

Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

The MAE app has all your M2U banking features and beyond. 
Apart from viewing, tracking, and managing your finances, the MAE app helps you manage tasks and plan your lifestyle with just a few taps. 


Here are a few reasons why the MAE app is the only banking app you need:


Banking
Enjoy all your essential banking features like View Accounts, Bank Transfer, Pay Bills and more!


Security 
Made to keep your info and funds extra secure, the MAE app is equipped with biometric login, instant alerts for your transaction, Secure2u for safer and faster transaction approvals, and the ability to hide your wallet balance whenever you need it. 


Lifestyle
Stay on top of your daily tasks and life goals with the MAE app’s vast array of lifestyle features, like Expenses, Tabung, and Sama-Sama Lokal food delivery. 


How do I get started?
- Maybank customers: 
(i) With M2U ID - simply log in with your M2U ID and all your M2U settings will be automatically synced with the MAE app.
(ii) Without M2U ID - register for one online on the Maybank2u website.
- Non-Maybank customers: skip the queue at the branch and sign up instantly with just your phone to enjoy all the benefits of a Maybank customer.



The MAE app will seek permission for the following:
i. Access to your camera to enable you to scan QR code and also upload documents when you apply for a new product or service.
ii. Access to your contact directory to give you the convenience of selecting your contacts when you make a transaction to a mobile number.
iii. Access to your location to offer you the most relevant food listings, marketing promotions or deals by our merchant partners while you are on the go.
iv. Access to your phone’s audio to enable you to make a direct call to the bank's hotline.
v. Access to your settings to enable push notifications to receive Secure2u alerts.

PNB ONE is an amalgamation of various banking processes being delivered through single platform. This is an all in one application which allows you to transfer funds, view account statement, invest in term deposits, manage debit card & credit card and many other exclusive services at your fingertips.
 
Services Available / Features of PNB ONE
a) Interactive Interface
	(i) Redesigned dashboard with more features available on the dashboard
	(ii) Access all the accounts on the dashboard itself.

b) Accounts
	(i) All accounts will be displayed in illustrative manner. ( Savings, Deposits, Loan, Overdraft, Current)
	(ii) Detailed view of account statement
	(iii) Check Balances

c) Transfer Funds:
	(i) Regular Transfers - “Self” (for own accounts), “Within” (for PNB accounts) & “Other” (for non-pnb accounts) will be there.NEFT/IMPS/UPI for Interbank fund transfers.
 	(ii) Instant Transfers (without adding beneficiary) - IMPS using MMID and Quick Transfer without adding beneficiary.
	(iii) Indo- Nepal Remittance
 
d) Invest funds
	(i) Open a term deposit account
	(ii) Mutual Funds
	(iii) Insurance

e) Transactions
	(i) My transactions will display all the recent transactions
	(ii) My Favorite Payee will show list of recent payees
	(iii) Schedule a transaction
	(iv) Recurring transactions
 
f) Safe and secure
	(i) Sign in much faster and simpler with your fingerprint
	(ii) 2 factor authentication
	(iii) Encryption

g) Manage Debit Card
	(i) Apply for a new card
	(ii) Update limits of ATM withdrawal, POS/ Ecomm transaction
	(iii) Hotlist debit card

h) Manage Credit Card
	(i) Link/De link Credit Card
	(ii) Auto Payment Registration
	(iii) Auto Payment De-Registration
	(iv) Change card limit
	(v) Statement on e-mail
	(vi) Damaged card replacement

i) Unified Payment Interface (UPI)
	(i) Send/ Collect money through UPI
	(ii) Transaction History
	(iii) Complaint Management
	(iv) User Deregistration

j) Scan & Pay (BHARAT QR):
	(i) Make Payment by scanning QR directly.
	(ii) Link your cards once and make the payment directly from the account.

k) Pay Bills/Recharge:
	(i) Register your biller pertaining to Mutual find, Insurance, Telecom, Electricity, DTH, credit card etc.
	(ii) Pay bills directly to your registered biller.

l) Languages: Available in English and Hindi

m)  Cheques
	(i) Inquire Cheque Status
	(ii) Stop Cheque
	(iii) Request for Cheque book
	(iv) View Cheque

n)   M-Passbook
	(i) View account statement of account
	(ii) Download account statement in PDF for offline purposes.

o)    Favourites

p)    Value Added Services
	(i) PAN/ Aadhar Registration
	(ii) E-mail ID Updation
	(iii) E statement registration
	(iv) E-statement de registration
	(v) MMID( used for IMPS)
	(vi) Last 10 SMS

q)    Complaint Service Management
	(i) Raise a complaint/ Service Request
	(ii) Track your request
	(iii) Request history

Simplify your life with TBC's Mobilebank 

Experience banking fully digitally – simple, instant, secure. TBC’s Mobilebank offers various features to make your daily banking experience seamless – from customizing your homepage to activating products wherever you are, right from your phone. 

Become TBC’s customer in just 30 seconds. Register in Mobilebank without any documents by verifying your identity with just a selfie. 

Get your new TBC Card via Mobilebank and use it instantly. Earn on every payment, unlock exclusive offers across Georgia, and transfer your loyalty rewards straight to your account. 

Transfer money 24/7. Send money to someone else in TBC, to another Georgian bank, or from another Georgian bank to your account – anytime you need. 

Pay utilities and recurring expenses with just one tap. Simple, fast, and always at hand. 

Get a fast consumer loan in under 2 minutes. Access up to 80,000 GEL, with an effective rate starting at 18%. 

Open a deposit and move step by step, closer to your goals. Start saving today and move towards what matters. 

Choose how you want to pay with TBC Pay Later. Divide your payment into up to 4 months with a 0% effective rate. Get a refund for an already completed payment and split it into your preferred number of months. Spread the cost of your desired item over up to 36 months at a monthly rate of 1.5% (effective rate: 36%). 

Invest in more than 6,500 U.S. stocks. Enjoy $0 fees for trading, account opening, deposits, and withdrawals. Build your portfolio on your terms and invest across the world’s largest sectors and industries. 

Manage remittances digitally, 24/7. Send or withdraw money from home at any time and enjoy special exchange rates.

Welcome to BIMB Mobile - Your Trusted Mobile Banking Partner

Bank smarter with BIMB Mobile, your all-in-one banking app for effortless financial management. With a sleek new design and an enhanced user experience, managing your banking tasks has never been easier.

Key Features
1. Quick & Secure Login
Access your account with ease using biometric login. Enjoy faster, more secure access with Face ID or fingerprint recognition for worry-free banking.

2. Refreshed Dashboard
Navigate your finances with an all-new, intuitive dashboard. Manage your accounts, view transaction history, track your wealth, financing, and card services—all from one simple screen.

3. BIMB Secure for Peace of Mind
Authorize your transactions safely with BIMB Secure, replacing GO Secure. Control your banking with enhanced security measures and get real-time transaction alerts for a safer banking experience.

4. Pay to Billers
Settle bills, credit card payments, or financing accounts instantly. BIMB Mobile makes paying bills quick, easy, and secure.

5. Prepaid Reload
Recharge prepaid mobile numbers in just a few taps—fast and convenient, so you can always stay connected.

6. Sadaqa
Donate to trusted foundations and organizations directly from the app. With BIMB, making a meaningful contribution has never been easier.

7. JomPAY
Pay your bills to over 10,000 billers effortlessly with JomPAY. Skip the queue and take care of payments from wherever you are.

8. Funds Transfer
Sending money to friends or family is seamless. Use DuitNow to transfer funds instantly using just a mobile number.

9. DuitNow QR
Pay to merchants who accept DuitNow QR, Malaysia’s national QR payment standard. Use "Scan & Pay" for easy purchases, or "Scan Me" to receive payments from others instantly.

10. Tabung Haji
Track and manage your Tabung Haji savings effortlessly. View balances, deposit funds, and save for your Hajj journey with ease.

11. Push Notifications
Get instant notifications for every transaction. Stay on top of your banking activities, in real-time.

12. Share Transaction Receipts
Easily share receipts with others via email, WhatsApp, or messaging apps after every transaction.

More Features at Your Fingertips
Update Profile: Manage your personal details quickly.
Change Transaction Limits: Adjust your transaction limits to suit your banking needs.
Latest Promotions: Stay informed of the latest deals and promotions from Bank Islam.
Enhanced Security and Control:
The BIMB Mobile app offers advanced security features:
Biometric Login for added protection.
BIMB Secure for safe transaction authorization.
Kill Switch to immediately disable your account in case of suspicious activity.

Permissions Required:
The app may request access to:
Camera: To update your profile picture.
Contacts: To read and modify your contact list.
Location: To find the nearest Bank Islam branch or ATM.
Phone & Storage: For secure calls to our contact center and storing app data on your device.

Experience the future of banking with BIMB. Download now and enjoy the freedom of managing your finances on the go!

developer: Empower Annuity Insurance Company of America
description:
“The Empower Dashboard gives me a full picture of where I am financially without having to log in to all my accounts. It definitely makes my financial life clearer and easier.” – Benjamin D.*  

You’re just a few taps away from downloading the app that Forbes gave 4.5/5 stars, describing its features as the “Best for Tracking Net Worth”.

안전하고 빠른 인증은 물론, 금융/개인정보 보호/헬스케어 등 다양한 서비스를 PASS 앱 하나로!

[PASS란?]
간편본인확인, 모바일신분증(운전면허증, 주민등록증), PASS인증서 등 인증 서비스와 내게 맞는 혜택과 자산정보를 지갑에 넣어 한 번에 확인하세요.


[서비스 대상]
- LG유플러스 이용 고객
※본인 명의의 휴대폰에서만 가입 및 이용이 가능합니다.
※LG유플러스 법인명의 휴대폰 및 MVNO(알뜰폰)에서도 이용 가능합니다.
단, 알뜰폰(법인)에서는 이용 불가합니다.
※만 14세 미만은 보호자(법정대리인) 동의 후 서비스 이용이 가능하며, 일부 서비스 이용이 제한됩니다.


[주요 기능]
- 본인확인 : PASS앱을 통해 비밀번호,생체인증을 통한 간편본인확인 및 인증내역 조회 가능 
- 모바일신분증 : 운전면허증과 주민등록증을 PASS에 등록하여, 실물 신분증과 동일한 법적 효력을 가지고 편리하게 사용 가능 
- 신분증 검증: 타인의 모바일 신분증의 진위 여부 검증 가능
- 스마트티켓 : 국내선 탑승 시, 신분증과 항공티켓 정보를 QR코드 하나로 확인 가능 
- PASS 인증서 : 각종 금융, 공공업무 인증 및 로그인, 전자서명 제공
- 전자문서 : 공공기관 증명서 발급, 열람, 제출 서비스 제공
- PASS머니 : PASS에서 적립한 머니를 현금처럼 내 계좌로 인출하는 서비스
- 급상승트렌드 : 고객들이 최근 많이 인증한 사이트 랭킹과 관련 정보를 제공하는 서비스
- 자산조회 및 추천 : 흩어져 있는 내 자산조회 및 나에게 맞는 금융상품 추천
- 휴대폰결제 : 휴대폰결제 이용내역, 한도 조회 및 변경 
- 금융, 건강, 보안, 휴대폰 시세조회 등 실생활에 유용한 정보와 혜택을 제공하는 다양한 서비스 제공
- 명의도용방지: 내 명의로 개통된 휴대전화를 조회하고 실시간으로 명의 도용 여부를 확인할 수 있는 무료 서비스

[이용안내]
- PASS 서비스는 LG유플러스에서 제공하는 무료 서비스입니다.
- 회원가입 : 앱 설치 후, 본인확인 완료 시 PASS 앱에서 사용할 비밀번호 혹은 생체인증 정보를 등록하시면 서비스 가입이 완료됩니다.
- 간편본인확인 : PASS 앱을 통해 인증 완료 하시면 간편본인확인이 완료됩니다. 앱 알림을 ON으로 설정해 두시면 더욱 빠르게 이용하실 수 있습니다. (앱 삭제 후 인증 시도 시 알림 불가)
- 모바일운전면허증 확인 : 운전면허증을 PASS 앱에 등록하여 온/오프라인에서 안전하게 사용하실 수 있습니다. 특히 오프라인에서는 모바일 운전면허증 화면 내 QR코드/바코드를 요청한 기관/검증자가 해당 코드를 읽으면 확인이 완료됩니다.
- 주민등록증 모바일 확인 : 실물 주민등록증 없이도 주민등록증에 수록된 정보를 PASS 앱에 등록하여 성인여부, 신원확인이 가능합니다. 오프라인에서 기관/검증자가 QR코드를 읽으면 진위 확인이 완료됩니다.
- PASS인증서 : 본인확인 및 본인 명의의 계좌인증 완료 후 인증서를 발급받아 사용하실 수 있습니다. 발급한 인증서는 3년 동안 이용 가능합니다.

[유의사항]
- 비밀번호 인증수단: iOS 15 이상의 모든 단말에서 이용 가능 하며, 생체인증수단의 경우 Touch ID(지문)와 Face ID(얼굴) 탑재 단말에서만 이용 가능 합니다.
- 3G/LTE/로밍 이용 시 요금제에 따른 데이터 통화료가 부가될 수 있습니다.
- 타 통신사 출시 단말은 서비스 이용이 제한될 수 있습니다.
- 휴대폰 사용환경을 임의로 변경할 경우(루팅, 해킹 및 기타), PASS 서비스는 동작하지 않을 수 있습니다.
- 앱 비밀번호는 개인정보보호를 위해 별도로 저장을 하지 않사오니 비밀번호를 분실하지 않도록 유의하세요!
- 서비스 이용 문의: 휴대폰 114/ 이메일: mfinance@lguplus.co.kr

[선택적 접근 권한]
- 알림 : 본인확인, 인증서비스, 혜택 안내 등 알림 수신을 위해 필요합니다. 
- 카메라 : QR코드로 인증, 운전면허증 촬영, 신분증 검증, 사진 촬영 등 서비스 이용 시 필요합니다. 
- 위치정보 : 금융기관, 공공기관 등에 모바일 운전면허 확인증 제출(전송) 시, 실시간 위치 정보에 기반한 맞춤 정보 제공 시 필요합니다. 
- 바이오 정보 : 본인확인을 위해 Touch ID(지문) /Face ID(얼굴) 인증 시 필요합니다.
- 사진 : 단말에 저장된 이미지 첨부 및 이미지 저장 시 필요합니다. 
- 동작 및 피트니스 : 만보기 서비스에서 걸음 수를 측정하기 위해 필요합니다. 

※ 선택적 접근 권한은 동의하지 않아도 서비스 이용이 가능합니다.

The self-service application is designed to simplify duty and Pay As You Earn (PAYE) computations. Additonally it includes a module for tracking customs clearance and offers capabilities for verifying MRA documents.

The Ecobank Mobile app allows you to enjoy our banking services instantly and conveniently on your mobile device. The app gives you access to affordable banking services and more wherever you are on your mobile 24/7 ,365 days a year. The app also gives you access to the Ecobank Xpress Account.

It is one unified application for all the 33 where Ecobank Operates.
